data.title: Eurasian Pharmaceutical Summit 2024
data.text:
The only conference in the region covering the majority of the pharmaceutical markets in the Central Asia, the Caucasus and Eastern Europe: Uzbekistan | Kazakhstan | Kyrgyzstan | Tajikistan | Turkmenistan | Azerbaijan | Armenia | Belarus | Moldova | Mongolia.

400+ participants from regulatory authorities, leading international and local pharmaceutical production companies, distributors, pharmacy chains and companies providing services for the pharmaceutical sector.

100+ speakers from regulatory authorities, leading international and local pharmaceutical production companies, distributors, and pharmacy chains.

20+ sessions on regulatory affairs, strategies, sales and production.

Only 29 days, 13 hours, and 53 minutes left until the forum commences.

Register now to secure your place at the summit!
